text:
We’ve launched the first edition of our Weekly Africa Solar Market Intelligence Brief. Last week saw a surge of utility‑scale solar announcements, with Egypt standing out for multiple new projects.

Read full Newsletter:https://t.co/dU1swhPcso
Sign up here:https://t.co/QcBwgFMVP9 https://t.co/k13puFkB9p

Africa – Solar
African School of Regulation with International Solar Alliance, from 24 Feb, hosts a 3-day webinar on regulatory frameworks for solar energy deployment & integration across Africa.

Register here: https://t.co/KI8sZCL7xn

#SolarEnergy #RenewableEnergy #AfricaEnergy https://t.co/f1WZY0cPn3

Member News
Dutch & Co is appointed as EPC contractor for Meridian Port Services’ solar initiative at Terminal 3, Tema Port, Ghana. Phase 1 will install 1.5 MWp, part of a planned 6 MW, cutting nearly 2,700 tonnes CO₂ annually.

Read full article: https://t.co/tdbghN9YEF

#Solar https://t.co/5Nof1Ec4CH

Member News
Collective Energy Africa invites installers, engineers & partners to technical trainings on Dyness systems & integration with Sosen inverters.

Nairobi – 26 Feb 2026, Pullman Upper Hill
Kampala – 6 Mar 2026, Protea Hotel

Learn more & register: https://t.co/wpqJIbsAkg https://t.co/RSUXbHEB69

Ghana – Utility-Scale
Sunon Asogli Power plans to boost electricity supply with 200 MW from four new solar sites & a 200 MW wind farm in Ada West. The third phase of its thermal project will bring total capacity to 850 MW.

Read more: https://t.co/PlR8TNZ7GD

#Ghana #Solar #SDG7 https://t.co/fde3J4VnJ3

Somaliland – Utility-Scale
President Cabdiraxmaan Maxamed Cabdilaahi inaugurates the Berbera Electricity Expansion Project, featuring a 5 MWp solar plant & 11.2 km 33KV transmission line to boost electricity reliability & meet rising demand.

Read more: https://t.co/vsZCfNqEKk https://t.co/ywDFHqSPdg

Africa – Financing
@RenewviaEnergy secures $10M from Claritas Capital to expand distributed solar projects in Kenya & Nigeria, delivering clean & reliable electricity to underserved communities and commercial customers.

Read more: https://t.co/WDmt2xNlZa

#Financing #MiniGrid https://t.co/nB2r0WNu01

Our Member is Hiring
Alternative Energy International is hiring a Technical Sales Manager to join their team in Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire.

Read the full JD here: https://t.co/1f9ynr5MHL
Submit your resume to: info@ae-mena.com

About Company, visit: https://t.co/oCqLVFljTn

#Hiring https://t.co/E3km73wkbu

Our Member is Hiring
DEV Solaire is hiring a Technical Commercial Manager to join their team in Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of Congo.

Read the full JD:https://t.co/fKagSt8tHv
Send your CV and cover letter to: info@devsolaire.com

More about DEV Solaire: https://t.co/91PFXXeKyH https://t.co/zSE4SZPnP8

Member News
Release by Scatec signs a 7-year lease with Tshukudu Metals Botswana for a 21 MW solar plant at Motheo Copper Operations near Ghanzi, expanding its mining-sector portfolio across Africa.

For more:https://t.co/kqy0gBhoJx
About Release by Scatec:https://t.co/hXdltlbAnV https://t.co/vndz4hnRdl

Liberia – Utility-scale
Over 10,000 homes in Lofa County will benefit from a new solar project by the Rural & Renewable Energy Agency (RREA), featuring a 9.35 MWh BESS & 1.6 MW diesel plant.

Read more: https://t.co/DdJxfCRgf2

#SolarAfrica #RenewableEnergy #EnergyAccess #SDG7 https://t.co/9OpEZPHtVj

Africa – Utility-scale
INOX Clean Energy partners with RJ Group & Sky Power to launch a renewable energy platform targeting 10 GW of solar across Africa, aiming for 2.5 GW installed capacity by 2029.

Read more: https://t.co/7I3dvO7KQR

#AFSIA #africasolar #CleanEnergy #SDG7 https://t.co/Vrc2qQiJ7J

Egypt – Utility-scale
Hassan Allam Utilities wins EPC contract for a 200 MW solar project with 120 MWh BESS in Benban, in partnership with Infinity Power, @EBRD & @Meridiam. Part of a 1,200 MW / 720 MWh solar & storage program in Egypt.

For more: https://t.co/9g4dWoI4N2

#Solar https://t.co/dCnKRhYtjg

Burkina Faso – Utility-scale
SONABEL advances a 20–30 MW solar plant in Koudougou, issuing equipment tenders & progressing the EPC process. The project is part of a broader 30 MW initiative covering Koudougou & Kaya.

Read more: https://t.co/RUYQX872nn

#AFSIA #africasolar #solar https://t.co/zlGa17j2IX

Ethiopia - Mini-grid
The government inaugurates a $1.58 million solar power project in the Dig district, which has a generation capacity of 350 kW. This marks a significant step toward expanding renewable energy access in remote areas of the region.

More:
https://t.co/d201b4ohXR https://t.co/uCZSnTYUdk

South Africa - C&I Wheeling
Scatec, via Lyra Energy, signs PPAs with three C&I clients for a large share of the 255 MW Thakadu solar plant, marking its entry into wheeling and direct private power contracts.

Read more: https://t.co/ZDOEOfv1MF

#SolarAfrica #AFSIA #SDG7 #Solar https://t.co/l31ERXgnwL

Burundi – C&I
The government inaugurates five solar-powered & digitally monitored health facilities under the UNDP Smart Facilities for Health initiative. Phase 2 will expand to nine more district hospitals.

Read more: https://t.co/jOV6sCiCEh

#SolarAfrica #AFSIA #SolarNews https://t.co/QzRc1nqJ2r

Member News
Release by Scatec signs a 7-year leasing agreement with Tshukudu Metals Botswana for a 21 MW solar plant at Motheo Copper Operations near Ghanzi, expanding Release’s mining-sector portfolio across Africa.

Read more: https://t.co/kqy0gBhoJx

#SolarAfrica #AFSIA https://t.co/9l7oKWVKtP

Zambia – Financing
SGC Investment LLC commits to deploying 500 MW of new solar capacity across multiple sites in Zambia, providing energy access to rural & underserved areas under the Presidential Constituency Energy Initiative (PCEI).

Read more: https://t.co/boM8CHrCxO

#Solar https://t.co/1tOmePIjna

Chad – Utility-scale
@GSUtilities starts construction of a 5 MWp hybrid solar plant in Amdjarass with 5 MWh BESS & 5 MVA diesel, financed by @ABUDHABI_FUND.

Sign up for the Africa Weekly Solar Brief  Newsletter: https://t.co/QcBwgFNtEH

Read more: https://t.co/U7uqh0i1OL

#Solar https://t.co/TyQ43lN6qa
